Hello! I’m [Adhithan Manivassakam](https://github.com/AdhiMvm).

## Project Overview

This project was developed as part of **[Kane's Data Science Bootcamp](https://bootcamp.davidkane.info/)**. It explores the analysis of depression levels and is available on [GitHub](https://github.com/AdhiMvm/Analyzing_Depression_Level.git).
